title: Bug 116829: Label height doesn't change with label font modification.
description: Description: Label font size doesn't change right away when it is modified. Steps to reproduce: 1.
OB: When modifying the font size of a label, the height of the label does not change accordingly.
EB: The label should automatically adjust its height to match the new font size when it is modified.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Modify the font size of a label.
2. Observe that the height of the label remains the same and does not adjust to the new font size.
